name: Messy Kitchen Secret
description:
Messy Kitchen Secret is ultimate puzzle solving adventure and a cool “mystery game” for kids and adults! Are you ready to become difference detection genius? If you like playing free puzzle games, you are surely going to love this “find the difference free” game which we have created especially for you! Discover “what's the difference” between two pictures and spend hours of fun playing this spot it game! Find objects which differ from one another and show us that you are the best player of “new find the difference games ! So, can you spot it? Find differences kitchens, start playing, and forget about all your worries!
Feaatures:
- Incredible graphics!
- Catchy melodies!
- Hints –when you need help!
- Zoom feature!
- Free of charge!
- Anti-boredom!
